name: Autastico
description:
Educational game focused on autistic children, but for all children from 2 to 5 years

BEAUTIFUL AND FUN

Beautiful graphics in Mobile Phones or Tablets! Play puzzles!

DRAW COLORED AND BEAUTIFUL SHAPES

Improves motor coordination. Differentiate facial expressions!

NICE MUSIC, COOL EFFECTS

Quality music and sounds help in learning

TUTORIALS EASY TO LEARN

Virtually, all frames have a tutorial

CREATE YOUR AVATAR

Make your avatar or a little friend
